      public String add_user(String firstname, String lastname, String email, String password, String account_type, Boolean approval)
      add a new user to the database
      Parameters:
      firstname - first name of user
      lastname - last name of user
      email - email of user
      password - password of user
      account_type - account_type of user (seller, buyer, admin)
      approval - approval of user (this is for when a seller is approved or not)
      Returns:
      a "success" response message

      Parameters:
      user_id - user's id as it is in the database

      lastname - last name of user
      email - email of user
      password - password of user
      account_type - account_type of user (seller, buyer, admin)
      approval - approval of user (this is for when a seller is approved or not)

      a user object with current users updated information
